newsletter.headline: Subscribe to newsletter
newsletter.info: Subscribe to our regular newsletter now and stay tuned on the latest products and special offers. You will be able to unsubscribe from it at any time, using this website or the link included in each newsletter.
newsletter.subscriptionPersistedSuccess:
You have just subscribed to our newsletter.
 To complete the registration process, search your email inbox for a confirmation mail and click on the link provided with it.

newsletter.subscriptionConfirmationSuccess: You have subscribed to the newsletter.
newsletter.subscriptionConfirmationFailed: Newsletter subscription did not work properly, please contact us.
